title: Odium - The Science Of Dying  mp3  320k  2014
description:
Odium - The Science Of Dying  mp3  320k 2014 What we got...
Odium is a German melodic thrash metal band founded in 1993. After seven albums placed on the German market in 2012 with Noiseheadrecords finally a label was found, which, internationally brought the eighth full-length album, Beautiful Violence, successful, and great encouragement to the relevant magazines in stores.

With this album in the luggage they toured across Germany and neighboring countries. Through the skillful mix of melody, Bay Area Thrash and raw and undistorted metal, it was never difficult for the Frankfurters around stage hog Ralf to make the stage to the ground.
